Published January 11 2015

Je Suis Charlie

Je Suis Charlie — Today, about 3 million people marched in Paris to honor the victims of the terrorist attack on French satirical magazine, Charlie Hebdo, last Thursday. A little less than a week later, our prayers and thoughts remain with the victims’ families and, indeed, France itself.

Enjoy your day.
